questions.q: Which city is famous for its knafeh?
Which spice blend is made with thyme, toasted sesame seeds, and sumac?
You visit a Palestinian home. What are you most likely offered, no matter the time of day?
When invited to a Sudanese home for dinner, you’re most likely eating from:
choices: Individual plates with forks and knives
A shared tray (Seniyya) using flatbread or kisra
A picnic basket in the garden
A fancy dining table with 5 courses
questions.answer: A shared tray (Seniyya) using flatbread or kisra

questions.q: During a Sudanese wedding celebration called 'Jertig', which color is worn to protect against the evil eye?
At a traditional Sudanese wedding, what is the groom traditionally holding when he arrives?
What’s the classic wedding dish served at Pakistani weddings?
What greeting means both peace and respect in Urdu?
What’s a popular festival that marks the end of Ramadan in Pakistan?
What Lebanese dish is made with raw minced meat and bulgur?
What happens during a typical Lebanese wedding entrance?
What’s a Lebanese street food favorite wrapped in pita?
Someone suggests having Mansaf for dinner. How are you most likely expected to eat it?
choices: With a fork and knife, daintily
With your hands, savoring the flavors and communal experience
You’d politely decline, as the smell is unbearable to you
questions.answer: With your hands, savoring the flavors and communal experience

questions.q: What does it mean if a Jordanian says “Your blood is heavy” (Damak Tgeel)?
What does “Roo7 ballit il ba7ar” mean?
choices: To go swim in the sea
To go away / Get lost / Do the impossible
questions.answer: To go away / Get lost / Do the impossible

questions.q: A Syrian sees a baby and says “To2borni!” What are they really saying?
choices: You’re so cute I could die
questions.answer: You’re so cute I could die

questions.q: What does “Yalla ya shabab” mean in Damascus slang?
What’s a common Syrian phrase for expressing disbelief?
When an Egyptian uses the phrase 'Haga tehar'a el dam', what are they describing?
Someone asks you 'Inta betishtaghalni?' — what do they mean?
Which dish is purely Egyptian and made of lentils, pasta, rice, and crispy onions?
You hear someone say 'Ach dana L9ra3 nmachto lih rasso' (Why comb the bald man's head). What does it mean?
choices: Don’t get involved in pointless trouble
questions.answer: Don’t get involved in pointless trouble

questions.q: 'Kobb l ma f ramla' (pouring water on sand) describes:
What does 'Lmosh li ma ywsel l 7outa ygoul 3liha 5anza' mean?
choices: If you can’t have it, you pretend you didn’t want it
questions.answer: If you can’t have it, you pretend you didn’t want it

questions.q: What kind of dessert is Makroudh, a popular sweet in Algeria?
choices: Semolina dough with dates or figs
questions.answer: Semolina dough with dates or figs

questions.q: What does the proverb 'Cross the loud river but not the silent one' mean?
choices: Better to face open drama than hidden danger
questions.answer: Better to face open drama than hidden danger

questions.q: What is 'chakchouka' in Algeria?
Which spicy red paste is a national obsession in Tunisia?
Your friend says 'Zed N9es' (نقص زيد). What are they asking?
choices: Turn the music up and down

questions.q: What’s 'Brik' in Tunisian food culture?
choices: Fried pastry with egg and tuna
questions.answer: Fried pastry with egg and tuna

questions.q: What is the national dish of Saudi Arabia, a hearty and flavorful rice dish often made with meat?
What is 'Mutabaq,' a popular Saudi pastry, known for?
choices: Being a stuffed and folded pastry that can be savory or sweet
Being a type of bread for dipping
questions.answer: Being a stuffed and folded pastry that can be savory or sweet

questions.q: What does the phrase 'Taslik' (تسليك) refer to in Saudi slang?
choices: Agreeing and going along with someone even if you know they're wrong or don't care
questions.answer: Agreeing and going along with someone even if you know they're wrong or don't care

questions.q: What is the national dish of the UAE, a delicious rice dish often served with meat like lamb or chicken?
What are 'Luqaimat,' a popular Emirati sweet, known for?
choices: Being very sweet and crunchy dumplings
Being a stuffed and folded pastry
Being a type of bread for dipping
questions.answer: Being very sweet and crunchy dumplings

questions.q: If someone is described as '7afyaan' (حفيان), what two things could this jokingly imply?
choices: They are very busy or excited
They are very formal or polite
They are very tired or sleepy

questions.q: What's a well-known Kuwaiti dish that combines rice with shrimp, often flavored with spices like turmeric and dried loomi (black lime)?
What kind of dessert is Gers Ogaily, also known as 'perfume cake,' popular in Kuwait?
choices: A sponge cake flavored with cardamom, saffron, and sesame seeds
questions.answer: A sponge cake flavored with cardamom, saffron, and sesame seeds

questions.q: What is a 'Diwāniyyah' in Kuwaiti culture?
choices: A regular gathering of men for socializing and discussion
questions.answer: A regular gathering of men for socializing and discussion

questions.q: What's the national dish of Qatar, a flavorful rice dish often made with meat?
At a Qatari celebration like a wedding, what traditional dance might you see performed by men carrying swords or canes?
What drink is most commonly offered to guests upon entering a Qatari home?
What's a common Bahraini breakfast item, often served with bread and sometimes topped with lemon, olive oil, and herbs?
When a Bahraini jokes, 'He's like a Samandega,' what are they suggesting?
choices: They are useless or don't do much, referencing a former football player
questions.answer: They are useless or don't do much, referencing a former football player

questions.q: What drink is often served during Bahraini gatherings as a symbol of hospitality?
What is a traditional Omani dish prepared for special occasions?
choices: Shuwa – spiced meat slow-cooked underground for a day or more
questions.answer: Shuwa – spiced meat slow-cooked underground for a day or more

questions.q: You're cruising down the highway when the sky turns orange and someone mutters, 'Oh, a haboob is coming.' What should you prepare for?
choices: A sudden, intense sandstorm that will sandblast your car's paint
questions.answer: A sudden, intense sandstorm that will sandblast your car's paint

questions.q: What drink is traditionally served with dates as a sign of welcome in Oman?
You’re invited to a traditional Iraqi dinner where the star of the show is 'Masgouf.' What’s hitting the table?
choices: A fiery stew made with desert lizards and secret spices
A massive carp, split open, salted, and slow-cooked vertically next to an open fire
Layers of flatbread, rice, and lamb broth so dense it’s called 'Tashreeb'
Sheep’s head, eyeballs included, boiled and served with khubz
questions.answer: A massive carp, split open, salted, and slow-cooked vertically next to an open fire

questions.q: You’re trying to describe a friend who is incredibly generous and has a big heart. What’s the best Iraqi slang to use?
choices: Kharbosh — a scratch, meaning he’s a bit messy
Abu el-Gheera — 'father of jealousy,' fiercely protective and honorable
questions.answer: Abu el-Gheera — 'father of jealousy,' fiercely protective and honorable

questions.q: Your friend greets you with 'Shaku Maku?' What does it mean?
You’re served “Canjeero” for breakfast. What’s it most like?
choices: A tangy, spongy flatbread—somewhere between injera and crepes
questions.answer: A tangy, spongy flatbread—somewhere between injera and crepes

questions.q: You hear someone say “Nabad miyaa?” as you walk in. What are they asking?
What is “Bariis iskukaris,” a beloved Somali dish?
choices: Spiced rice with meat or vegetables, cooked all together in one pot
questions.answer: Spiced rice with meat or vegetables, cooked all together in one pot

questions.q: What is Kacchi Biryani, a beloved dish served at Bangladeshi weddings and Eid gatherings?
choices: Aromatic basmati rice layered over marinated raw mutton, slow-cooked with potatoes and ghee
Lentils mixed with rice and fish curry
questions.answer: Aromatic basmati rice layered over marinated raw mutton, slow-cooked with potatoes and ghee

questions.q: An aunty sees you sitting alone and says, “Biye kobe?” What does she mean?
choices: She’s asking “When are you getting married?”—and she's probably already picked someone
She’s inviting you to her daughter’s wedding
questions.answer: She’s asking “When are you getting married?”—and she's probably already picked someone

questions.q: What is “Fuchka” ?
choices: Hollow crispy balls stuffed with spicy mashed potato and tamarind water—eaten fast, one after the other
questions.answer: Hollow crispy balls stuffed with spicy mashed potato and tamarind water—eaten fast, one after the other

questions.q: What is Hyderabadi Haleem?
choices: A slow-cooked wheat and meat porridge
A sweet rice dessert made with coconut
questions.answer: A slow-cooked wheat and meat porridge

questions.q: An uncle calls you “nalaayak.” What’s he trying to say?
Your cousin says “Arrey bhai, full jugaad!” What’s going on?
choices: A clever fix or hack just happened
questions.answer: A clever fix or hack just happened

questions.q: What is Menemen?
choices: Scrambled eggs cooked with tomatoes, peppers, and olive oil
questions.answer: Scrambled eggs cooked with tomatoes, peppers, and olive oil

questions.q: You’re at a Turkish home and someone says “Afiyet olsun.” When is this usually said?
Someone is acting arrogant and flashy. A Turkish elder mutters: “Burnu havada.” What does that mean?
You’re served Byrek fresh out of the oven. What are you eating?
choices: Flaky pastry filled with cheese, spinach, or minced meat
questions.answer: Flaky pastry filled with cheese, spinach, or minced meat

questions.q: Your uncle says “Turp t’kesh!” after you talk back. What does he mean?
What does it usually mean when a Kosovar mom goes silent and just says “Mirë…”?
choices: She’s definitely not fine and you should fix it before she explodes
questions.answer: She’s definitely not fine and you should fix it before she explodes

questions.q: Your cousin says “Keefik today, ça va?” What language is that?
choices: All of the above—and yes, that’s a full sentence
questions.answer: All of the above—and yes, that’s a full sentence

questions.q: Your aunt sends a voice note that begins, “Beta, I’m just saying…” What’s coming next?
choices: Guilt, a marriage suggestion, and a story about someone else’s perfect child
questions.answer: Guilt, a marriage suggestion, and a story about someone else’s perfect child

questions.q: You say “no thank you, I’m good,” and someone replies, “La, wallah, taste it.” What happens next?
choices: You’re force-fed three servings and complimented/insulted at the same time
questions.answer: You’re force-fed three servings and complimented/insulted at the same time
